entry.title: 6" 12W LED Slim Panel Recessed Ceiling Light with Junction Box, Square
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Downlights
Price: 26.91 - 409.32 (9 variants)

Consider installing this 6INCH LED Downlight if you're looking for an energy-saving LED lighting fixture for your house or other property. This square downlight in white color will look great in hallways, galleries, bedrooms, and living rooms, among other indoor spaces. The Downlight is made with high-quality SMD2835 LED chips, ensuring long-term dependability. The fixture's color temperature of 3000-5000 kelvins guarantees a subtle warm white lighting ambiance.
This 120-volt indoor downlight fixture consumes just 12-watts of energy per hour. It will have a 900-lumen output and a 120° beam angle. As a result, please make sure that it will provide adequate lighting when covering a vast area. The product requires recessed installation and can be used to create a false ceiling in a variety of rooms in your home. You can be sure of electrical safety in wet indoor sites because this lighting fixture complies with industry-standard ETL, ES, and FCC certifications. The product also comes with a 5-year limited warranty against manufacturing defects and a lifetime rating of 50,000 operational hours.

entry.title: 4" 9W LED Slim Panel Recessed Ceiling Light with Junction Box, Square
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Downlights
Price: 22.23 - 506.84 (9 variants)

Square-shaped 4INCH LED Recessed Downlights are intended for new or remodel applications such as homes, shops, and hotels. It has a design that allows it to be installed in confined ceiling areas or soffits. This slim fixture is simple to install because it doesn't require a separate housing and can be mounted directly into the ceiling. The Recessed Downlight has an IP rating, making it suitable for damp environments, and it can be dimmed with cutting-edge LED dimmers. Available in a 4" square shape and with a color temperature range of warm (3000K) to daylight, you can choose the color temperature that best suits your needs (5000K). This Downlight comes with a 120-Volt dimmable LED driver. It disperses light evenly over a 120-degree beam angle, resulting in a uniform illumination. The recessed Downlight has a 50,000-hour lifetime and complies with ETL, ES, and FCC guidelines. When you buy this product, you will get a five-year Manufacturer's Warranty.

entry.title: RGB Remote LED Controller Set - Remote with 2 Scenes Dimming
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Strip Light Dimmers & Controllers
Price: 46.13

This RGB LED controller set with 2 scenes dimming is perfect for controlling your RGBW LED light strips.

  • The remote can be operated from 65ft range and is touch-activated for direct and fine-tuned color selection.  

  • Controls power, pause, brightness, control, dynamic mode selection, color wheel, speed-selection touch buttons.   

  • The RGB controller is compatible with LED light strips that can operate within the range of 12V-24V.   

  • Low power consumption with long-distance transmission.

  • Powerful anti-interference ability. 

  • Simple and easy to operate with 2scenes dimming brightness.  

  • 4 amp per each of the 4 channels. 

  • 12-24 VDC range.

entry.title: LED Backlit Mirror with Thin Plexiglass Edge, 55.1 X 25.6 Inch, Touch Sensor Switch, Defogger, CCT Remembrance, Titan Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 1903.20

Add an aesthetic by installing Front W51.1'' X H25.6 ' LED vanity mirror of Titan Style to your dark, dingy bathroom and transform it into an inviting space. The clean and futuristic appearance of LED Bathroom Mirrors makes them ideal for contemporary interiors. This mirror is featured with an inbuilt Defogger, touch switch control, CCT remembrance, and waterproof features. This is the ETL-listed LED vanity mirror that provides you with a clear, crisp, and flawless reflection and comes with  5 years manufacturer warranty.

Defogger is the special feature of the LED Vanity Mirror that helps to remove the fog that gets collected on the mirror. It saves time for manually cleaning the mirror. The Defogger is not controlled through the switch on the mirror. The switch only controls the LED Light on the mirror to turn on and off or to change CCT. If you wish to switch the defogger off, you will have to turn the switch off or take the plug off of the outlet. The temperature of the defogger will always be 59-68 degrees more than the room temperature. To elaborate, let’s say if your room temperature is 59 degrees Fahrenheit then the temperature of the defogger would be 86-95 degrees Fahrenheit.

Fluorescent lights were once considered as a great lighting solution but ever since the inception of LEDs in 1962, it has surpassed all other traditional forms of lighting. Be it in lifespan, brightness, energy-consumption, or performance LED lights outperform any traditional form of lighting easily. These 55W 2X4 LED Panel lights are an ideal replacement for 200W Fluorescent Lights. With a total of 6600 lumens of brightness and a high color rendering index(CRI>80), these lights are among the best luminaires for all your indoor lighting needs be it residential or commercial. The led flat panel lights are DLC listed meaning they are eco-friendly and thus make you rebate eligible. Their sleek and slim design makes them a great choice for hotel interiors, medical and health institutions. The lights come with 50,000 hours of lifespan along with a manufacturer’s warranty of 5 years.
